name: ClothoFirstTalk
_source: s;Clotho;It has been a long time since a human visited me.{w}{br}Welcome, Simon.
s;Clotho;I know you have many questions.{w}{br}But first, I promise that you have nothing to fear from me.{w}{br}Even within my realm, I will not harm you.
s;Simon;Thank you, Lady Clotho.{w} Though, may I ask...{w}{br}Why are we in a graveyard?
s;Clotho;I understand, it must be quite unsettling.{w}{br}I, of my sisters, am the one that cuts the thread of life.{w}{br}I decide the time and means of each death.{w}{br}Graveyards are homely.
s;Clotho;Speak. Once again, you need not fear me.
s;Simon;Why did you give me this blessing?{w}{br}Of everyone, why me?
s;Clotho;Because it was not your time to die.{w}{br}Your world has need of you.{w}{br}I have seen where your thread ends, Simon-{w}{br}you are destined for a great role in history.
s;Simon;But can I ever die?{w} Am I... immortal?
s;Clotho;My blessing will not protect against age or disease.{w}{br}But sword or magic will never slay you.
s;Simon;Thank you, Lady Clotho.{w} I will use your gift wisely.
s;Clotho;There is no need for promises, Simon.{w}{br}I know exactly how it will be used.
s;Simon;Then where should I head next?
s;Clotho;You are not my errand boy.{w}{br}I will not hold your hand through your journey.{w}{br}Now, is there anything else?
s;Clotho;Then I will return you to your world.
s;Clotho;Simon, if you see my sisters, be sure to greet them.{w}{br}They are excited to meet you.
